content:
Hey all,

I need to add more patients to a STU3 server within my own sandbox using the SMART-ON-FHIR sandbox.hspconsortium.org. I would like some guidance on how to post a bundle of 5,000 + patients to my own server on the sandbox.hspconsortium platform. Are there any source servers that have over 5,000 patient instances already so I can use a tag uploader? Or is this something I need to "hard-code"? I.E. jumble the names of patients and post it to the sandbox.

I'd like to have the names of patients not to be uploaded to my sample EHR more than twice as a caveat.

Thank You
Have you looked into https://github.com/synthetichealth/synthea and this tool: https://projectcrucible.org/testdata
